techmeme.title: Palo Alto Networks says it closed a $500M deal to buy IBM's QRadar cloud security software assets, and plans to migrate customers to Palo Alto's Cortex XSIAM (Katrina Manson/Bloomberg)
Robinhood launches a new feature in the UK to let retail investors lend stocks they own to interested borrowers, in a bid to grow its international footprint (Ryan Browne/CNBC)
Sources: a16z has shut its Miami office in May because staff weren't using it enough; VC funding to Miami-based companies has flagged since 2022's crypto rout (Anna J Kaiser/Bloomberg)
Microsoft announces a Copilot: Wave 2 event on September 16 at 8:00 AM PT, where it is expected to announce a Copilot rebrand and new features (Tom Warren/The Verge)
The UK's CMA says Microsoft's acquihire of the Inflection team doesn't cause competition concerns, but designates the deal as a merger (Paul Sawers/TechCrunch)
